attributes.action: Increase the fine for using a mobile phone while driving.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
If the government had the courage to increase the fine for driving with one hand and a mobile phone in the other,the practise WILL stop.
It should be widely publicised that a £500 fine will be enforced and the drivers mobile phone confiscated for the first offence.
A second conviction should result in confiscation of the phone and the vehicle.
The only reason people keep flouting the present law is because of the derisory fine at the present time.
The new proposal to increase the fine to £60 WILL NOT stop the irresponsible
drivers.
Give them something to really fear and the practise will soon stop.
